table_caption: Descriptive statistics and group differences of network properties controlling for age, gender, education and white matter hypointensities.
table_foot: Mean ± standard deviation. ANCOVA, analysis of covariance. Group differences are controlled for age, gender and white matter hypointensity volume. CC, clustering coefficient, L, shortest paths, Eglobal, global efficiency, CCnorm, normalized clustering coefficient, Lnorm, normalized shortest paths, N, number of connected nodes, E, number of edges, C, total sum of edge weights.
